answers.answer: I'm glad you kept us posted with the gender. Sorry you were disappointed :\I have not dealt with either of those things, but I know sometimes fluid volume is larger some days than others. Are you scheduled for an early GB test?  I get mine done in 5weeks.... at 28weeks

question: So today was my ultrasound and just as I thought im having baby boy #3 I actually cried when she told me but I just want him to be healthy. They said I have alot of fluid so they want to check for diabetes and he also has fluid in his right kidney have any of you ladies dealt with either things
title: November Mommies
